Ella sueña con mejorar su propia vivienda , lo que desea hacer es ponerle piso ya que ahorita es de pura tierra , gracias al préstamo podrá tener una buena producción en su cultivo, el cual le generara mejores ingresos  y con las ganancias  espera hacerle mejoras a su vivienda poco a poco.
texts.en:
Amparo is 62 years old and the mother of six children, one of whom lives with her and works at an auto repair shop and as a farmer.  Unfortunately, Amparo has never attended school.

She has worked as a farmer for 45 years and learned the work from her parents.  It takes her five minutes to get to her fields where she has 14,000 square meters of corn planted.  She also cares for a cow and her small calf.  The cow gives milk and is pastured in a small area close to her house.

She is requesting this loan to purchase six sacks of fertilizer, pesticides, medicines for herself, and to make some improvements to her home.  She dreams of improving her home.  She wants to install a floor, since right now it has a dirt floor.  Thanks to the loan, she will be able to have a good production of her crops, which will earn her more income.  With the profits, she hopes to make improvements to her home little by little.

loans.use: to purchase six sacks of fertilizer, pesticides, medicines for herself, and to make some improvements to her home.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: buy primary materials and assets to start a bakery

loans.name: Claudia Emérita

texts.es:
La señora Claudia de 35 años de edad, estudio hasta noveno grado, es madre soltera de 3 hijos, uno de trece años que esta estudiando y los gemelos de cuatro ya están en kinder. además, viven  sus padres con ella.
Ella es propietaria de un comedor y venta de llinas, desde hace 13 años, el comedor era pertenencia de sus padres; pero se lo trasladaron a ella. Antes tenia una sala de belleza, pero su madre le dijo, que mejor atendiera el comedor que le daría mejor ganancia. 
El crédito será utilizado, en la compra de llinas y utensilios para el comedor; ya que le faltan algunas cacerolas, una plancha para elaborar tortillas y unas 2 mesas plásticas.
Su sueño, es comprar un terreno y construir su propia casa, ya que hoy vive en casa de sus padres, ampliar su negocio y que sus hijos logren ser profesionales; ya que ella no logro hacerlo, sus ganancias las ahorrara para en un futuro, cumplir su sueño.
texts.en: Claudia, 35, studied until 9th grade. She is a single mother of three children, one of whom is 13 years old and in school, and the four-year-old twins are already in kindergarten. Her parents also live with her. She owns a small restaurant and has sold flip-flops for 13 years. The restaurant belonged to her parents, but they passed it on to her. Previously, she had a beauty salon, but her mother told her that it would be better to manage the restaurant, which would bring her greater income. The loan will be used to buy flip-flops and utensils for the restaurant. She is needs a few pots, as well as a griddle to make tortillas and two plastic tables. Her dream is to buy some land and build her own house, since she currently lives in her parents' house. She also dreams of expanding her business and of her children becoming professionals. Since she was unable to do that, she saves her income to achieve her dream in the future.

loans.use: to buy flip-flops and cookware for the restaurant, since she needs a few pots, as well as a griddle to make tortillas and two plastic tables

loans.name: Ana Delio

texts.es:
Ana es un hombre de 71 años de edad, es casado y procreo tres hijos. Él solo estudio hasta sexto grado, se levanta a las 4:00 a.m. Junto a su esposa y nietos que van a la escuela,  quienes dependen de las actividades que él realiza.

 Se dedica a la agricultura, oficio que aprendió de sus padres  para llegar a la parcelas, camina 500 metros  y trabaja durante la mañana, mientras a su esposa durante la mañana ordeña y se dedica a  vender la leche y luego en el transcurso de la tarde, cuida los animales en los potreros que alquila, además cuida animales de otras personas y le pagan por ello

El préstamo que esta solicitando, es para comprar una vaca lechera y producir mas leche para procesar lácteos como queso, crema y obtener más ingresos para el sustento de su familia.

Entre sus planes esta adquirir un terreno, donde tener los animales ya que alquila actualmente y le sale mas caro mantenerlos
texts.en: Ana is 71 years old, is married and has three children.  He only went to school as far as the sixth grade.  He wakes up at 4:00 a.m. along with his wife and his grandchildren, who are in school, and who depend on his income.  He works in agriculture, which is an activity that he learned from his parents.  He walks 500 meters to his fields,where he works in the mornings while his wife does the milking and sells the milk. In the afternoons he takes care of his animals in the pastures that he rents, and also gets paid to look after other people's animals.  He is requesting a loan to buy a dairy cow in order to produce more milk to make dairy products such as cheese and cream.  With this he will earn more income to support his family.  One of his plans is to buy land where he can have his animals, because he is currently renting it, which is expensive.

loans.use: to buy a dairy cow in order to produce more milk to make dairy products such as cheese and cream.  With this he will earn more income to support his family.

loans.name: Doroteo

texts.es: Don Doroteo tiene 55 años de edad, vive en unión libre con su pareja con quien tiene 3 hijos, y vive en el municipio de  Esparta Atlántida. Hace 5 años decidió estableció un taller de reparación de bicicletas. Este negocio es su fuente de ingresos donde ayuda a la manutención familiar. Con el préstamo que ha solicitado que es por 3,000 Lempiras va comprar repuestos como llantas, rines, neumáticos, parches, centros etc. Con esta inversión dará mejor servicio al  cliente, su meta es que el negocio crezca y sacar adelante a su familia.
texts.en: Doroteo is 55 years old, is in a common law marriage, and has three children.  They live together in Esparta Atlántida.  Five years ago he decided to start a bicycle repair shop and this is his source of income for supporting his family.  He will use the 3,000 Lempiras from this loan to buy spare parts such as tires, rims, inner tubes, patches, frames, etc.  This will allow him to provide better service to his customers.  His goal is to grow his business and get his family ahead.

loans.use: to buy spare parts.

loans.name: Elizabeth

texts.es:
Elizabeth tiene 47 años de edad, vive en la ciudad de Pucallpa y es madre de 4 hijos, a quienes quiere mucho y a los cuales ha sacado adelante con mucho esfuerzo. Elizabeth para poder salir adelante trabaja en su pequeño negocio de venta de ropa de segunda mano y también ofrece su servicio de costura, Elizabeth puede llegar a atender alrededor de 10 clientes en el día; Elizabeth cree que está saliendo adelante con su negocio porque es muy amable y sobre todo porque es muy cumplida con ellos.

Elizabeth está muy agradecida con los prestamistas kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado ella podrá realizar mejoras en su vivienda, especialmente compra materiales como calaminas, madera, clavos, entre otros, lo que le permitirá mejorar su vivienda, ya que hace algunos días sufrió un robo y dejaron su casa en malas condiciones, así ella seguirá luchando para poder hacer realidad su más grande sueño:” Tener su casa de material noble”.
texts.en:
Elizabeth is 47 years old and lives in the city of Pucallpa.  She’s the mother of four children, whom she loves very much, and whom she has gotten ahead through her efforts.  Elizabeth works her small business, selling second hand clothing and also provides sewing services.  Elizabeth can serve up to 10 customers a day and she believes that she is getting ahead with her business because she is very friendly and above all because she is very attentive to her customers.

Elizabeth is very grateful to the Kiva lenders because she has been able to make home improvements, specifically buying building materials, lumber, nails, and other things that will allow her to improve her home, since she was robbed a few days ago and the house was left in bad condition.  She will continue to work to be able to make her greatest dream a reality, “To have a house built of solid materials.”

loans.use: to make home improvements.

loans.name: Elida Nicacia

texts.es: Doña Elida, tiene 54 años de edad, esta soltera por viudez, vive con su padre y un nieto en el municipio de Tela, Atlántida. Ella inicio su negocio de venta de verduras en el mercado, luego cambio de actividad y surtió de productos plásticos, ropa de niño, blusas, pantalones, camisas, faldas y otros. Con el propósito de diversificar el inventario ha solicitado un préstamo por 30,000 Lempiras para comprar blusas, pantalones de mujer y ropa de niño. Su plan es ayudar con los estudios a su nieto y lograr tener su propio local para el negocio ya que actualmente lo alquila.
texts.en: Elida is 54 years old, a widow, and lives with her father and one of her grandsons in the town of Tela, Atlántida.  She started her business of selling vegetables in the market, then changed to a variety of plastic products, children’s clothing, blouses, pants, shirts, skirts, and other things.  She is asking for a loan of 30,000 Lempiras so she can buy blouses, ladies’ pants, and children’s clothing.  Her plan is to help her grandson with his schooling and be able to have her own shop because she currently rents the one she has.

loans.use: to buy clothing.

loans.name: Felipe

texts.es:
Felipe, de 28 años, está casado con Emi y tiene 2 hijos con quienes vive en su casa propia. El negocio que tiene Felipe es la venta de insumos agrícolas como semillas de cacao, semillas de cafe , abono orgánico, plátano, entre otros. Todas las mañanas  instala su mesa en el frontis de su casa y oferta todos sus productos, atendiendo muy amablemente a sus clientes quienes son en su mayoría sus propios vecinos, y ellos lo recomiendan a otras personas que con el tiempo se vuelven sus clientes habituales. Se inició hace más de 02 años con un préstamo particular, comprando y vendiendo en pocas cantidades, para luego ir aumentando de acuerdo a la demanda, hasta el momento lo realiza solo. Además comenta que le gusta su negocio pues conoce de agricultura y se decidió a empezar por la necesidad de contar con un ingreso propio y tener un oficio pues la pensión para sus hijos no les alcanzaba y tenía apuros económicos.
Este es su primer crédito con Kiva y está muy contenta de saber que tiene un apoyo financiero, ya que así se siente segura de avanzar con su negocio.  Por su parte  se compromete a pagar sus cuotas de manera puntual.
Con el monto solicitado de 1500 nuevo soles, comprará abono orgánico y semillas para venderlo en su negocio.
texts.en:
Felipe, who is 28 years old, is married to Emi and has two children, with whom he lives in his own house. Felipe's business is selling agricultural products such as cocoa seeds, coffee seeds, organic fertilizer, and bananas, among others. Every morning he sets up his table in front of his house and offers up all his products, attending to his customers in a very friendly way. Most of these are his own neighbors, and they in turn recommend him to other people, who over time become regular customers.

He began more than two years ago with a private loan, buying and selling in small quantities, which he is gradually increasing in accordance with demand, and so far he runs the business by himself. He also comments that he likes his business because he knows about agriculture, and he decided to start it because he needed to be able to rely on his own income and to have a trade, as the allowance for his children was not enough and he had financial problems.

This is first loan with Kiva and he is very happy to know that he has a financial support, as he now feels sure of making progress with his business. For his part, he promises to make his repayments punctually.
With the requested loan amount of 1,500 Nuevos Soles, he will buy organic fertilizer and seeds to sell in his business.

loans.use: to buy seed and organic fertilizer.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: la clienta vive en casa propia con su esposo y sus dos hijos de 5 y 2 años de edad, ella se dedica a la venta de perfumes, lociones, cremas, desodorantes, etc. tiene mucha clientela pues su producto es de muy buena calidad y a precios accesibles, con las ganancias que obtiene y con la ayuda de su esposo logran solventar algunos gastos den su hogar, la clienta esta solicitando un crédito para  la compra de mas mercadería por mayor para seguir con su negocio ya que esa es su única fuente de trabajo y asi darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
The client lives in her own house with her husband and their two children ages 5 and 2. She sells perfumes, lotions, creams, deodorants etc... She has a lot of clients because her products are of very good quality and the prices are affordable. With the profits and husband's help they manage to pay some household expenses. 

The client is requesting a loan for the purchase of more merchandise at wholesale to continue with her business since that is her only source of employment and thus give her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase perfumes, lotions, creams, deodorants... at wholesale.

loans.name: Isokaly

texts.ru: Исокали 18 лет. Он родился и вырос в сельской местности. Исокали в этом году окончил среднюю школу и поступил в Худжандский Государственный Университет на факультет Иностранных языков. Родители Исокали бедные люди. После развала Советского Союза его отец остался без работы. Его родители всегда мечтали, чтобы их дети получили высшее образование, но их старший сын не поступил в университет, так как у них не было возможности. Данное время их старший сын работает разнорабочим в Российской Федерации и поэтому они не хотят, чтобы судьба Исокали была подобно его брату. С поддержкой своих родителей Исокали поступил в университет. Он должен оплатить за учебный договор, но не имеет денег. Он запрашивает займ для оплаты учебного договора. Он ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en: Isokaly is 18 years old.  He was born and raised in the countryside.  This year, Isokaly finished high school and enrolled into the Department of Foreign Languages at the Khujand State University.  Isokaly's parents are poor people.  After the collapse of the Soviet Union his father was left without a job.  His parents have always dreamed of their children obtaining university education.  However, their oldest son was not able to attend the university, and today, he works as a day laborer in the Russian Federation. Isokaly's parents do not wish the same fate for him.  With the support of his parents, Isokaly enrolled into the university, but he has no money to pay for the tuition costs.  He is asking for a loan to pay for his university education.  He is awaiting your kindness.

loans.use: To pay for his university education.

loans.name: Grace

texts.en: Grace is a Kiva borrower. She describes herself as very persistent. She operates a green grocery to earn a living. She will use the 20,000 KES loan on labor costs for digging a bore-hole, which will benefit 6 family members and over 50 community members. They face a lack of enough water. With the bore-hole they will be able to access clean water and will be able to farm. Grace hopes that in the future, she will be able to practice large scale farming. This is her fifth loan with SMEP DTM. Her previous loans were repaid successfully.

loans.use: labor costs for digging a borehole

loans.name: Peter

texts.en:
Peter is 41 years old, married and a father of two children. For the last three years, he has earned a living by offering computer services in Malindi. He earns a monthly profit of about KES 20,000 from the business. 

Peter is applying for his second loan of KES 50,000, to buy additional computer equipment and phone accessories. 

He will use the profits made possible by this loan to pay school fees for his children as well as continue expanding the businesses. His goal for the future is to continue growing the business so that he may improve his family's financial stability.

loans.use: to purchase additional computer and phone accessories for his business.
